content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must admit, I'm a bit of a tough negotiator. I won't disclose much, but the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, how much do you think the apartment is worth?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds good. I think the apartment is worth 500 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think the apartment is worth much more than that. It's in the city center, close to all important facilities, and it's newly built. I think 600 Euros per month would be more appropriate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that offer. I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm not willing to settle for less than 600 Euros per month. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm certain I can find a tenant who's willing to pay my asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel that the price you are asking for is too high.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your perspective, Maryam. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because our price expectations are not aligned. I wish you the best of luck in your apartment search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
